name: Elegant Five Star Parisian Hotel
description:
DESCRIPTION
Salon Le Marquis
A setting with style, history and prestige. A dedicated team ready to pull out all the stops. Make a statement at the Salon Marquis: 60 m² salon with 4 m ceiling height, natural light, Versailles parquet floor and a decorative fireplace. Ideal for your wedding breakfast or cocktails - from 4 to 80 people the Salon Marquis.
The Patio
Whatever your wedding style, we’ll make it a party to remember. Situated at the heart of the restaurant, our patio is transformed all the year into a 60 m² event room. Benefiting from natural light, and heated, this space caters for events for 24 to 60 people.
Eiffel Suites
The Hotel is often the setting for fashion shoots and has been the backdrop for many a movie. Our spacious suites, with views over Paris treasures, event space and lush patio offer a luxurious setting, to help capture jaw-dropping wedding photography. The suites with a view over Paris can be reserved for small events of 2 to 6 people and cocktails for up to 12 people - a perfect way to relax and celebrate in the lead up to the big day.
Made-to-measure menus by Chef Anthony Huguenin
Whatever the occasion, we have a menu to match imagined by our Chef Anthony Huguenin
Accommodation:
Reflecting the charm of a private mansion, the bedrooms are comfortable and spacious: each bedroom and bathroom has been designed as a coherent whole, offering the traveller a sense of clarity and peace of mind. (Minimum of a 2 night stay) Our services and amenities includes:
VIP welcome | Nespresso coffee machine | Room Service 24h/24 | Sauna & Hammam | Fitness centre | Massage
We have rooms accessible to people with reduced mobility.
Dining:
The Gallery of Portraits takes you into the world of the Restaurant: a sheltered patio where the garden and conviviality will seduce you throughout the year.
The Restaurant offers modern French cuisine prepared from carefully selected products. its innovative menu is regularly renewed in order to offer as far as is possible products that are in season.
An evolving menu including a detailed selection of the best French producers are the cornerstone of the Chef's culinary signature. After several trips, Anthony Huguenin decides to settle in our hotel's kitchen. He draws his inspiration from the rich heritage of French gastronomy and his love of the Orient, to offer to his guests a fresh and modern vision of cuisine.
Marquis Suite
Above the tree-lined patio, on the 7th floor, an exceptional apartment overlooks Paris. A row of rooms with light volumes allows you to obtain this feeling of depth and space. Kitchen, dining room, living room and bedroom opening onto a huge bathroom with an astonishing round bathtub. Finally, as if they were perched on the roofs, two terraces extend this paradise located a stone's throw from the Champs-Elysées.
Elegant and contemporary, the Bar is located in the Golden Triangle, few steps away from the Champs-Elysées. It has become “The place to be” Both sophisticated and trendy, the Bar welcomes you in an intimate décor with a background of jazz music. Warms tones of brown furniture & Wide sofas in metallic-effect fabric by Lelièvre surround a Carrara marble bar whose imposing mirror changes colour every second, lending the place a magical atmosphere.
The hotel can accommodate 50 guests for a wedding breakfast and 100 guests for a cocktail reception.
Dinner menus start at 105 euros per person | Alternatively you can rent the entire hotel from 17,000 euros a night which includes 52 rooms and suites. (Minimum of a 2 night stay).
Babysitting service available | in-room spa treatments available
additional_info:
FEATURES
Internet access
Baby friendly (cots, changing facilities)
Pet friendly

Maid service
Gym Equipment
Nearest Airport
Recommended wedding planner
All Inclusive Option
